mentionedBy.name: CyberArk Software
mentionedBy.notes: Released Secret Server in 2005, an enterprise password management software for IT admins, competing directly with CyberArk in the emerging privileged password management space

mentionedBy.name: CyberArk Software
mentionedBy.notes: Growing rapidly with Secret Server as a comprehensive privileged account password management solution, offering password vaulting, automated rotation, session recording, and real-time threat analytics

mentionedBy.name: CyberArk Software
mentionedBy.notes: Rapidly growing PAM vendor with Secret Server as a flagship product, ranked number 436 in Deloitte's 2018 Technology Fast 500, offering easy-to-install privileged access management with cloud and on-premises deployment options

mentionedBy.name: CyberArk Software
mentionedBy.notes: Major PAM vendor offering Secret Server and comprehensive privileged access solutions with strong focus on cloud and on-premises security, before merging with Centrify in 2021 to form Delinea
